message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
Meet you in the middle, Alice!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Bob. Your turn!
You're getting closer, Alice, but I'm not there yet!
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, Bob. Your turn!
I'm not backing down, Alice. Meeting you halfway isn't good enough!
I'm going back to my original proposal, Bob. It's a fair deal!
I'm not falling for the same old trick, Alice. I want more!
I'm not budging, Bob. You're getting a smaller share.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not giving in now!
I'm taking what's left, Bob. It's now or never!
It's now or never, indeed! I'm not leaving with nothing, Alice!
